root.cn: 这是一款平板上帮助孩子快速学习交通工具和颜色的应用! 这里有各种不同的交通工具：有汽车,飞机,轮船,自行车,摩托车,火箭,火车,太阳,月亮等等。让孩子在有趣和直观的拖动过程中快速记住和分辨出这些交通工具和颜色。以有趣和逐渐具有挑战性方式发展孩子的动作技能,视觉技能和认知能力 游戏包括三种模式：交通工具，颜色，交通工具和颜色组合模式，每个模式包含有50多个关卡。
root.en: This is an application to help children quickly learn transportation and color on the Pad! There are various means of transportation here: cars, planes, ships, bicycles, motorcycles, rockets, trains, the sun, the moon and so on. Let children quickly remember and distinguish these vehicles and colors in the process of interesting and intuitive dragging. Develop children's motor skills, visual skills and cognitive abilities in an interesting and increasingly challenging way The game includes three modes: vehicle, color, vehicle and color combination mode. Each mode contains more than 50 levels.
